DataElement.preferredName: Patient Reduced Intimacy Present Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Patients who have decreased sexual desire after the diagnosis of cancer.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Made less in size or amount or degree._A condition of close feelings shared between two people. Intimacy includes emotional intimacy and physical intimacy._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Made less in size or amount or degree.:A condition of close feelings shared between two people. Intimacy includes emotional intimacy and physical intimacy.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Made less in size or amount or degree.
A condition of close feelings shared between two people. Intimacy includes emotional intimacy and physical intimacy.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
